tweet: Want to test out a new strategy that stays neutral to alt exposure by keeping long/short exposure equal.   Not running it with live money yet but trial period is long $ETH, $ADA equal portions and short $XRP, and $TRX.   Will update this thread each week to see how it progresses.
Lots of people keep asking when #cardano Shelley (#staking) will be released? Breaking news: When it’s ready! You can’t rush perfection. Have faith. $ada @cardano #kingcardano 👑 #crypto 🥩
